issue.title: [C++] Add streaming compression interfaces
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3409](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3409). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the compression and decompression methods offered in `arrow/util/compression.h` are one-shot. We also need to expose streaming compressor and decompressor interfaces.
